website_summaries.verdict: We find these glasses to be a great alternative to name-brand sports glasses, for a fraction of the cost. Attractive, stylish, snug-fitting and lightweight with high clarity and optics.
pros: UV-400 mirror flash-coated lenses offering UVA, UVB, UVC protection and blue-light filtering
Very high clarity, HD-grade lenses offer great optics with no distortion
Comes with a hard case, extra nose piece, and cleaning cloth
cons: blue lens also available but would require buying an additional pair
No venting on front of lens

customer_reviews.title: High quality rugged capable
customer_reviews.text: I could not have been more happy having these on my almost 300 mile trip down the Colorado River! Very little if any eye fatigue from the constant sun while rafting, and even after running multiple rapids and being sucked under the water these glasses stayed ON! After ten straight days of river rafting and camping there wasn’t even a scratch on the lenses! I would highly recommend these! Everyone who tried them on was impressed and would ask to trade shades since their glasses weren’t as high quality as this product! Great price for outstanding performance!
customer_reviews.author: QueenBae0408

customer_reviews.title: BEST  no glare and true color sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: After optic nerve surgery, I was advised to purchase polarized tactical glasses to protect eye from harmful UV rays as well as viewing in most natural light. Most all sunglasses too dark which causes eye to strain. I tested 6 tactical glasses and these Hulislem glasses were hands down the big winner confirmed from staff and friends. Hulislem had no eye strain at all even when sun is on the face. The colors you see without glasses will be the same when glasses are worn. Very comfortable; many times forget they are on my face. Can be worn indoors (grocery stores with too bright of lighting), which is great for sensitive eyes, have a headache, or...just because.
customer_reviews.author: Merry Trucksis

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as an alternative to some very expensive ‘big name’ polarized sunglasses I have. But after receiving these and trying these out, these have become my primary sunglasses. These sunglasses are amazing! The fit very well, don’t move around on my face, and are extremely comfortable. The lenses provide crisp and clear sight while reducing glare to nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a trip and was looking for a secondary pair of glasses so didn't want to pay a lot. Unfortunately you get what you pay for- I am returning them because similar to another reviewer they are severely warped on the right side and do not sit evenly on the face. You can see by my pics the disproportion between the left and right sides. I attempted to adjust them but since the plastic frame is cheap I didn't want to use much force because I can see them breaking easily.
customer_reviews.author: Nobo323

customer_reviews.title: Symmetric break, poor quality frame
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the first pair and they sent the wrong color, which I exchanged. Received new pair, they fit well and were pleasant to look through. Took them on a family vacation, opened the protective case on the first day and found they were broken. They had been in a backpack with my phone, laptop, and boat registration, not exactly rough carriage. The breaks were in identical and symmetric spots across the top bridge, and by the look of the break, it seems like a bad weld/join. Shame, since I liked wearing them for the 5 minutes I could before they broke. Nice lenses, but junk frames.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Superior Style & Quality for A Fraction of the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Most of my sunglasses collection consists of Ray-Ban, Maui Jim, Serengeti, and other high--end "name brand" selections. As a result of serendipity, I stumbled across these Hulislem S1 Sport polarized sunglasses and they have become my favorite, "go to" sunglasses for daily wear. The quality of the workmanship and lens polarization are comparable to those of my much more expensive glasses,...and the style is bold, unique, and very comfortable. And at less than 10% of the cost of the sunglasses in my high-end collection, buying more of these is a no-brainer! I highly recommend these sunglasses!
customer_reviews.author: J. B.

customer_reviews.title: Covered in MOLD!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even get to see the sunglasses. I opened the box which was sealed and the inside was all moldy and it smelled like a wet basement. The sunglasses case is fabric on the outside and was also covered in mold. Disgusting. I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: kellyp

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap sunglasses, with all that the name implies. Mine arrived very quickly so that was good, but the quality is low. They basically are a solid piece of plastic with hinges and lenses. Mine are crooked and they don’t sit on my face right. The front part isn’t straight so the shape doesn’t match my face and one side is much closer to my eye than the other. Same for the part that goes over the ears. I’ll be sending them back without ever wearing them out of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Singerie

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses! Getting a second pair for back up!!
customer_reviews.text: Sunglasses had great eye coverage!! They were comfortable wearing them on 8-12hr days hiking nearly nonstop- so very little time w/ them off (normally the region behind my ears will ache by the end of the day BUT not w/ these)! I was very pleased with these glasses! They were dropped a few times on concrete and rocks and held up exceptionally well!! I will probably go ahead and grab a second pair to have as back up for my next long trip!!
customer_reviews.author: jwolfe

customer_reviews.title: Junk construction
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sunglasses as part of a lightning deal on Amazon. They are lightweight and comfortable for working out. After about two weeks the lens film started separating from the rest of the lens. Now the view has a horrible bubble and it is not worth wearing anymore. These are not made for the Florida heat/sunshine.
customer_reviews.author: H. Setty

customer_reviews.title: I am fascinated by these sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: HULISLEM sport polarized sunglasses with HD vision and 100% UV protection fit very well, are lightweight, comfortable and stylishly designed. The lenses have the latest S1 technology system which is to see all colors perfect and natural. They can be used by men or women. Excellent for guiding, going to the beach, doing outdoor activities. For the price you can not ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting anything dramatically different based on other pairs of sunglasses I have purchased elsewhere. BUT, when I put these on and drove in bright Texas sunlight, I was blown away by the clarity of everything I looked at. I have glaucoma and macular degeneration so for me to notice the difference, I can only imagine what someone with good eyes will see. I am going to recommend these to my wife and other family members. Thank you for helping me see better and be safer on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Angie S.

customer_reviews.title: Light-weight Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: These are surprisingly nice sunglasses despite the low price. They are polarized and provide UV protection. I had been apprehensive about buying sunglasses on line but have been staying away from retail establishments as much as possible during Covid-19. I recently underwent cataract surgery and discovered that my old RayBan sunglasses bought over 20 years ago no longer gave clear sight through the lenses. The big, bulky glasses provided by the doctor block my side vision. So, I searched on Amazon. I found this pair, which has worked well for me so far. The only negative is that the nose bridge area cannot be adjusted; however, I remedied that by using nose pads. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mac

customer_reviews.title: Worked well on a beach vacation
customer_reviews.text: Went away on a Caribbean vacation and needed some sporty, functional, & cheap sunglasses. These were great for beach sports, volleyball in the pool/ocean, and general sunlight reduction to comfortably see on the beach in the blazing sun. Sturdy enough, traveled well - the hard covered case was great to throw into your carry-on and not worry about the glasses snapping/breaking while things got banged around in the overhead bins. The picture attached are the glasses in white/blue while on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable. First, they are extremely tight, even on a small head. Second, I've had lots of polarized sunglasses, none distorted colors like these do. After 10 minutes of wear, I had to take these off because they were giving me a headache. My girlfriend tried them and experienced the same. Poorly designed for fitment and usability.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great Sports Polarized Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving it 4 stars due to 2 items, the polarization of the sunglasses, compared to others, I can usually take head on Sun beams when driving without an issue, though these do a good job, I don't consider it the best. It also fits my head a little strange, not perfectly, nor did I expect that at the price point I purchased for, but overall I am pleased with the purchase and will keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony L.

customer_reviews.title: Good sunglasses at a good price but a little uncomfortable for prolonged use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for work. I work outdoors and the sunglasses that I currently have block to much of my peripheral vision. These glasses look good and do not block my peripheral vision. The issue I have with these sunglasses is that the bridge of my nose starts getting sore if I use it for more than a couple of hours. I have a lot of different sunglasses and unfortunately these are the only ones that are uncomfortable with prolonged use. I still like the glasses and will keep them for short trips or to go to the beach etc but for prolonged use I will use my other glasses.
customer_reviews.author: HazelTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: No better, stronger, than cheaper versions
customer_reviews.text: Based on glowing text by the manufacturer here on Amazon, all about the strength of the frames, Italian design, etc., I bought two different pairs of their glasses. They arrived with fancy looking cases and for a very short while I had my hopes up. But....they both failed as quickly as any others, proving to be no stronger than anything else I had ever bought, and for cheaper. During the time they were usable they did not perform better than others I had used and for which I had paid less. I do not recommend this brand and will go elsewhere in future.
customer_reviews.author: David Bowles

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The right lens has 3 scratches on it. I put them on to see if I could see the scratches and I can so I have to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores M.

customer_reviews.title: Fog up from Body Heat
customer_reviews.text: I do not like very much on these glasses. They fog up to the point where they cannot be worn thus becoming useless. Just from the heat that comes from one's face fogs them up so poorly that they cannot be worn. I am tired of spending good money on this junk from China and its the last pair I'll ever buy from these type of vendors. I'm sure they do not cost more than $1.00 - $2.75 to manufacture if that much.
customer_reviews.author: DIGITALSHOOTER

customer_reviews.title: NOPE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are flimsy and cheap feeling (yes I know they were inexpensive) and they DO NOT look good on women in my opinion - unfortunately I missed the window to return them due to family matters. Also I bought them for tennis but the frames don’t allow for clear vision if that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My first polarized glasses
customer_reviews.text: I have a regular pair of sunglasses that I love but that are not polarized. I’d struggle with driving on a sunny day, going to the beach, and playing sports outside with them. They kept sun out of my eyes but I’d things were too bright I just couldn’t see. These sunglasses are a game changer. They’re my first polarized glasses and it’s amazing the difference they make. I never thought that replacing my old pair would make such a drastic change. These glasses help me see so much better in the car. I don’t have to pull my sun visor down on top of using sunglasses. I really like them!
customer_reviews.author: DJ Cronrath

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Hulislem makes excellent sunglasses for the money. This is my second pair of theirs. I have owned many pairs of cheaper sunglasses from Amazon and other places and I find these to be the highest quality of all of them. They just seem to have a little extra reinforcement. Another thing about these is that they have adjustable nose pieces, just like my other pair of the same brand. I have had sunglasses that pressed on my nose too much and it made them a little uncomfortable when worn for a long time. These take care of that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Fire

customer_reviews.title: Good overall for rough use
customer_reviews.text: I am rough on sunglasses, between horseback trail riding, hiking, etc all in the Arizona heat. They have survived many drops from my hands without breaking. They do not slip from my face, and allow air to circulate so most of the time don't fog up from my sweat. My only issue is now that I've had them a little over a year, the rubber nose pads are falling off. I've affixed them with flexible glue ("Shoe Goo") and so far so good for the past 2 weeks, just not sure how much longer that will hold.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying the glasses. My husband said they fit well, good coverage and great deal. What clenched it was the nose pads. Being asian we have a smaller nose bridge, so glasses slip.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good lenses & very lightweight, but rigid and cheap-feeling
customer_reviews.text: Pros: These sunglasses are very lightweight as advertised, and the lenses are excellent in that they provide great UV protection without glare or distortion. Cons: The extremely lightweight material makes the glasses both look and feel a bit...cheap. More importantly, they are very rigid, which makes them a bit uncomfortable to wear--there is virtually no flexibility with the material. Overall: If they fit your skull shape perfectly, they *should* be comfortable and provide the key features of what good sunglasses should provide. For me, it was difficult to "forget I was wearing" them because they are rigid to the point of discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Ok.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after my Shady Rays broke and couldn’t find new ones for some reason. Pros: - good at doing what sunglasses should do - I like the tint... grayish and not brownish Cons: - they feel like cheap plastic. I worry about breaking them every time I touch them - not as comfortable on my ears or nose as the SRs were hard plastic pieces there instead of rubber or something soft Net, they’re fine and I’ll probably use them until they break. Liked my Shady Rays a lot better though.
customer_reviews.author: Q Docter

customer_reviews.title: Solid sunglasses. Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: First pair I received had a small scratch in the lens, nothing major, but it probably happened during shipping. I contacted customer service and they solved my issue right away. All that aside, the sunglasses look and feel great, and the polarizing is good quality. It’s not just some thin film. (They also include this cool little card you can carry in your wallet to test the polarization of sunglasses at the store or whatever)
customer_reviews.author: B.T. Frank

customer_reviews.title: Nice affordable sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I'd been looking for some really affordable sunglasses to go out on my road bike and found this glasses. The lenses are very good for what I needed. Are first glance the body looked nice, same plastic as the expensive brands, but at a very close look you can see the finished edge in some parts is not good, but hey I'm not buying glasses to look at them. These came with a case which is very nice and very well made. Though I'd rather the company had put that money into the glasses since we customers use the glasses and not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos E. Dehesa Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses.
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand some of the bad reviews for these sunglasses. The glasses came well packaged and without any issues. The glasses seems very dark until you put them on and it was very clear and not as dark as the outside looks. The price is very reasonable and fit my face well. I don't thinks it's the company's fought if you have a big face/head and they don't fit correctly. Great glasses and will buy again if I need a set of sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance G.

customer_reviews.title: Same exact product as Torege online at Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought Torege that lasted one outing until the hinge broke. This is classic import plastic that is cheap and brittle. These cheap sun glass manufacturers use crap plastics that just doesn't have the flexibility and durability of better brands. I noticed that this brand is identical to Torege, must be the same company in China under a different brand. I will give them a try for $20 bucks, but will learn the same lesson again and again.....quit trying to find deals and spend some money on quality. My 20 yo Oakley's are great but got tired of replacing nose pieces and the frames need replacing finally.
customer_reviews.author: B Positive

customer_reviews.title: Update - Do not Buy these glasses. Good value and quality and secure fit
customer_reviews.text: Update DO NOT BUY THESE GLASSES. after wearing for about two weeks coating coming off the lens. Glasses are very unsightly. Very comfortable and well constructed glasses. Wore them in the ocean for the first time this weekend and sun protection is great along with visibility and snug fit. Stayed put in the surf. Nice case supplied also. I would definitely recommend these sun glasses.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Not for those with larger heads
customer_reviews.text: This unit was purchased for a replacement of blublocker military-style glasses in grey, which they do not offer anymore. They come with a well-made hard-shell, zippered protective case. My 2 issues with this item: they do not fit well for me (larger head, I guess), the solid black bar of the frame underneath is extremely distracting and blocks lower area of field of vision, and the I consider the lens coverage to be too small. I wanted to like them but they are not for me. 3 stars because of the nice protective case.
customer_reviews.author: dlrife1965

customer_reviews.title: Basic cheap sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: The package was damaged and extremely dirty and appeared to have been opened and removed from original plastic wrapping. The case that the glasses come in did a good job of protecting them but I don't think the damage to the case can be fixed. Not sure who is responsible for the poor care quality. The glasses scratched very easily and will fog up even when not being worn. They looked ok when new but are essentially ineffective and impractical
customer_reviews.author: Gary Anthony Whittle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Cycling Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sunglasses for cycling. I was a little concerned that the lenses might make it too dark early in the morning or when riding through tunnels. So far they have been ideal in every circumstance. Thy fit perfectly and don't jiggle on my face when I'm riding. The polarized lenses actually allow me to see contrast better and without glare. For the price, fit, and style these are the best sunglasses I have ever owned. There return policy is also fantastic. The first pair I bought I returned because I wanted a different lens color. They took them back without any problem. You really can't go wrong with these sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wolsey

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are excellent sunglasses. Fantastic case. I am below average size and these fit perfectly. Don't shade all that much but that is not what I was looking for anyway. I wanted something with slight shade reduction that I can use for shooting and driving. Also wanted polarized for driving in the rain because it is said the road is clearer during heavy rains with polarized glasses. I have yet to be in a heavy rain storm to see how the road looks. I will update when I do; the whole idea may be an urban legend because I have an expensive pair of Oakley's and didn't see much of an improvement in clarity when raining heavily.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are good sunglasses in that they provide ultra violet protection and are polarized. But, the right noserest fell off by itself and I had to use crazy glue to hold It on, not good, considering they are 2 days old.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer changed the design of the nose clips!!!! :(
customer_reviews.text: Bought two pair of these sunglasses and REALLY liked them for the $$... comfortable, very nice for the price! Lost one pair and immediately ordered a new pair. BUMMER< they changed the nose piece so now your hair ALWAYS gets snagged in them if you put the sunglasses up on your head... say while making a golf shot. WAY annoying that you pretty much pull your hair out each time you take them off - AND not because of the poor golf shot!! LOL Went from a 5 star to not buying another pair. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: K. Peck

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these a few months back. I was hesitant about purchasing glasses online and not being able to see how they actually fit in person, but I could not be more pleased with this purchase. These are comfortable, and get the job done. I wear sunglasses quite often, and once these need replacing, I will be buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Ends all glare and helps vision.
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! I recently found out I have cataracts and brightness from glare (daytime and night) was makinhg my vision blur and was seeing double. These polarized lenses totally ended that. I see clearly now. Wish I had gotten these years ago. They are very comfortable and come with a great clamshell case which protects them. I strongly recommend these for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Ever hear the song Cheap Sunglasses? Well this is it. Probably the most uncomfortable pair of sunglasses I’ve ever tried. Do yourself a fav. DON’T BUY ONLINE!!! And if you’re serious about sunglasses as I am buy the high end ones. You get what you pay for. These where so cheap that I didn’t even waste the time sending them back. I gave them to my 12 year old nephew.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Lostracco

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality sunglasses for a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I got these sunglasses for my 14 year old daughter who plays travel/high school softball. First off, she thought they were stylish and they fit very well on her head. She said she could hardly tell they were there. She said that they were good for sun protection but also didn't make things too dark where she couldn't see. She plays in the outfield and tracking balls up in the air is something that is important for her to be able to do. She said these sunglasses make things more clear without the darkness that some other sunglasses do. I tried them on and can confirm this to be true. Probably going to get some to run half marathons in.
customer_reviews.author: atobonez

customer_reviews.title: Great until lens started coming apart
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t expecting too much out of these sunglasses and they were great for about 6-8 months. They are light and comfortable, and just about as fashionable as designer eyewear 5 times the cost. Noticed on a recent beach trip that the left lens has started to delaminate and doesn’t look so great. They are otherwise functional, but with the lens starting to break down with very minimal usage I can’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: O. Chughtai

customer_reviews.title: Built to last you a long time
customer_reviews.text: Great shades overall. Well built and seem to be made to last for a long time. I’ve had them for 3 months now and they’re just as good as day one. They come with a surprisingly sturdy case that you could probably throw at a wall and it wouldn’t harm the glasses, and it looks and feels very nice. Also comes with a microfiber polisher that really helps after running or playing sports after you get a sweat or any sort of grime on them.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Reyelts

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, Nice
customer_reviews.text: I own three pairs in different colors to match motorcycle outfit. I wear them during rain and at Night...Yes at night, I can see clearly and no glare from upcoming traffic. During rain here in Florida the streets reflects the sun glare like a mirror, these are polarized cutting all the glare and you will forget you are wearing them for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Nice sunglasses for the price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time in perfect condition and with all of the other inclusions intact. The glasses are a little larger than what I would prefer but they seem well constructed and are great for blocking out glare. Very light-weight too. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sun Glasses for Runners ++++
customer_reviews.text: Superior quality, lightweight, great fit, glare free, outstanding value for the $$$, and I bought two pair!! By far the very best for long distance runners as they are comfortable and gives your eyes double protection from the sun and particles in the air++++ First Class customer service when I had a question, and it was immediately answered and resolved.
customer_reviews.author: J.Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical but impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty picky about my sunglasses was a little skeptical about buying sunglasses online as i couldn't try them on before i bought them. After getting them and opening the box I was immediately impressed by them and that was before even trying them on but after I did that I was blown away with how clear everything was in the middle of the day. They are very lightweight and don't feel like they are trying to smash my skull in but still seem to hold on pretty well. Over all I would recommend these to anyone looking for a nice set of shades.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey J

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy these
customer_reviews.text: Too small for my normal sized head. You have to pay for shipping to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: The case is worth more than the sunglasses.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Yes, good sun protection, light weight, and good for working out it you don't care about possibly damaging or losing your glasses. Plus you get a nice case to protect your cheap sunglasses. Cons: If you are looking for poor quality and a cheap price, you found your sun glasses. They are tight above the ears, uneven when worn, and definitely not produced evenly when you set the glasses on a flat surface. I didn't return them, I gave them to a 10 year old kid.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Brown

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality lens
customer_reviews.text: This is a low quality sunglasses. Lens are cheap plastic and not clear like good lenses are. I play tennis and these are too dark to play tennis in, I have about a dozen pairs of relatively inexpensive sunglasses from 15 dollars to 45 dollars and this is the worst pair. I tried to give it to a friend and after they tried them, they said "no thanks".
customer_reviews.author: mwhite

customer_reviews.title: Can’t put my finger on it...
customer_reviews.text: They are lightweight but the frames sit oddly on my face and as other reviewers mentioned are uneven. They are more like wearing safety glasses. Since I work in tree care I’m okay with that. They do not fog up. Also it took me a few days to get use to the lenses they have an odd curvature to them that kind made me feel motion sickness.
customer_reviews.author: Serious Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Look great, fit great, and prevent glare
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses! I bought them mainly for driving as I live in Louisiana and the glare from the sun is just too much, especially in the summer. They cut it down drastically without being too dark, so very comfortable vision can be experienced. They also feel comfortable and look sharp - not too "sports-looking." Great price and come with a hard case for storage with a snap hook for if you want to attach it to anything while outdoors working or playing.
customer_reviews.author: bevthinks

customer_reviews.title: Use these glasses for Pickleball
customer_reviews.text: I bought these with 2 intentions. To protect my eyes from the sun and a pickleball. I play pickleball and they kind of seem like more sturdy sun glasses to withstand a blow of a pickleball. Luckily I haven't been hit but these are strong and solid glasses and look sporty too. I am happy with my purchase. The only thing I would dislike, they are just a little bulkier than they looked but I have adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Lila Rawlings

customer_reviews.title: Lens are good. Clear
customer_reviews.text: Lens are good. Clear. Other than that they are junk. Cheap frames. Loose and floppy. Gaps between frame and lenses. A bunch of small hairs in pouch. Would get 5 stars if were $5 which is what they are worth. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Wykle420

customer_reviews.title: These sunglasses are a great value!
customer_reviews.text: The glasses fit great and I wear them for playing tennis and have had no issues at all with them moving on me. This despite the fact I tend to sweat a lot. The wraparound lenses are great and so much better to have that extra peripheral vision support. I'd buy these again even at double the price I paid. Note to manufacturer, please don't take that as advice to increase prices! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Lenses don't last.
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses worked great for the first several months, but now the lenses are rapidly degrading. It's like the material is breaking down internally and losing its polarization. It started as little spots near the edges of the glasses and is progressively spreading over the lenses. At the rate it's going the glasses will be unusable in the next month or two.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & stops the sun.
customer_reviews.text: Stopping the sun is a must for me. I've been light sensitive all my life & polarized sunglasses are the only things that help, but they usually cost hundred's of dollars & I'm tired of paying that kind of money for Ray Bans or whatever that will break in 6 months. I've had these for a couple months & they are still strong. That's good for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty L. King

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money!
customer_reviews.text: Despite reading a number of -ve reviews, I decided to go ahead with the purchase (gut feeling really!).... and to my surprise, the glasses are good! Granted they are not Oakley, Sun-Ban or Nike, but then again, its price tag is not in $100s! I would consider it as a "fit for purpose" purchase. No regrets.... :c))
customer_reviews.author: matrix

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and frames seemed too small
customer_reviews.text: I found these sunglasses to be uncomfortable because they are very tight around the skull. Also, the polarized feature is nice but because the frames are so small, I found that the sunlight got into my vision anyway. I tried using them for tennis but when I served into the sun, these sunglasses did not do the job. For these reasons, I would not recommend these sunglasses. Instead, I ended up going with a pair of Nike Vision Skylon Ace XV sunglasses which had larger frames and were very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot S.

customer_reviews.title: Decent, inexpensive sunglasses.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these as all purpose sunglasses, and they are great for that. With the reasonable price, I'm not afraid to toss them around like I am with my more expensive sunglasses. The noise piece is comfortable and they are fairly hat friendly. I've worn them for running, working in the yard, and driving and they've been just fine for all of those.
customer_reviews.author: NICKandKRISTY

customer_reviews.title: Polarized & affordable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and affordable glasses. I purchased these for kayaking, I wanted glasses that would be secure on my head, had polarized lenses and affordable enough wouldn’t be the end of the world if they got lost in the river. These fit the bill, I like the larger wrap around design and the tint of the lenses works great on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great softball glasses!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glasses for my 14 year old daughter who plays travel softball. These are great glasses that fit perfectly inside her face mask or inside her catcher’s mask. They don’t fog up and are a dark polarized lense. They have a great hard case she can throw in her catchers bag without worrying the glasses will break. Definitely worth money and have recommended to her teammates.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Contacts Bite Into Bridge of Nose
customer_reviews.text: These glasses look good and offer eye protection but are not comfortable to wear. The nose contacts bite into the bridge of your nose. It’s OK over a short period but over time become increasingly uncomfortable. Over a long drive I have to remove them because the nose contacts have sharp ridges that bite into my nose. I suppose they are meant to prevent slipping but I would have preferred a smooth contact that would remain comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent R

customer_reviews.title: Night HD polarized vision, light, and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I just want a pair of sunglass just in case I need it for multiple occasion. I didn’t expect the quality of how low of money I paid for it. Man, I’d say it can be compare with my Oakley, and Costa. Probably it’s gonna be my daily wear now. It’s so clear with what they call HD polarized, perfect on the sun, light, hug perfect to my face and super comfortable. I wore it to my fishing trip, it was perfect and not a sight of tired, and spitters on my ear or nose. Highly recommend, thinking getting another 1 with different color
customer_reviews.author: Theo t Ly

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh ok nothing great.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not to sure what all the rave reviews are about. It’s a cheap decent pair of sunglasses. I was expecting some thing better I suppose. I didn’t want to spend a lot of money on my normal Oakley polarized, I misplace them often, but apparently for fishing these suck. I’ll just keep them in the truck as my daily driving sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Bought Two
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair at the start of summer to mow the yard in and take to the lake. They have performed so well I purchased a second pair (just in case). What goes to the lake doesn’t always make it home. I’m sure you can relate. I like them enough to have two pair. Good sunglasses!
customer_reviews.author: LuvDrones

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear bifocals, but I find the bifocals hurt my swing when playing golf. Bought these and played 18. Even without correction the glasses worked great. Actually, the lack of correction helped my swing. Usually I pick a spot on the ball and focus on it. Without correction, I just look at the white and swing away. Made hitting through the ball easier with a much better follow through.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Jones

customer_reviews.title: Liked them so much I bought them again....
customer_reviews.text: The only negative thing I can say about these glasses is they scratch. That being said, it was my fault they got scratched by not taking good care of them. My oakley's no sit on my dresser and collect dust while these are my go to glasses. I recently bought a second pair to replace the first and received the same quality product. I would by these again and again if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: jason gray

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: I like how these look! I deducted one star because they do feel a little firmer on you while you use them compared to other glasses, but they are good otherwise! This firmer feeling can be useful if you’re trying to do anything that involves you moving a lot, like being on a speedboat
customer_reviews.author: Dominik

customer_reviews.title: Good value and fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time getting glasses to fit - high nose bridge pushes normal glasses too high on my face. These work - very please with the fit and out of the box quality. Time will tell, just received. Packaging is very well done, glasses arrived protected, and appear to be build OK for an inexpensive pair of glasses. Early returns - I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Weckop

customer_reviews.title: Love the view...the fit is just a little off
customer_reviews.text: These glasses off great views...light...they for me are just slightly off on my face with how they rest on my nose if I wear them close...if I wear them a little further back off my face no issue. That's very subjective as we all have different faces...I will just say they don't fit as good as my Oakleys, but they fit good enough I kept them and wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Manuszak

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I like these. I’m not using these to wear them at an outdoor wedding or anything but they are good for running or mowing the lawn. Comfortable compared to the old school Oakley’s that wrap around your head. Lenses are solid. Price was right
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Okay-for the money
customer_reviews.text: Although they spent some money on tooling-they don't have their process dialed in. The frames are warped and hurt the bridge of the nose. I rolled the dice looking for a replacement for my scratched (ugh!) pair. These get demoted to mowing the lawn and weed whacking.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Dee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome glasses
customer_reviews.text: My husband was wearing these at work...while moving some chairs in a crawl space his head came up and caught the corner of a metal cabinet that was on the wall..if it werent for these glasses the corner would have gone directly in his eye....the glasses didnt break or scratch...right now we are thanking them for protecting his eyes
customer_reviews.author: Judy kelly

customer_reviews.title: Awkward visually distracting
customer_reviews.text: Wearing the glasses their visually distracting. When your eyes are more focused on the frame their a waste of money. I need to visually see in front of me, but when wearing them your distracted. Well, their a waste of money. I strongly don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Todd Allen

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for....
customer_reviews.text: At first I really liked these glasses, had them for about 2 months, and then I noticed a crack in the frame. This plastic frame is very brittle, not much flex in the frame....not sure what they are made of, tried to super glue it back and the glue will not hold together!! FYI, I very careful with my glasses...so I'm not even sure how these broke?? Update: Contacted customer service, and they were very helpful, they understood the issue and they say they will send me a new pair of sunglasses, excellent customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: rdillon64

customer_reviews.title: Design and Polarization Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am from Phoenix, Arizona where there is 260+ days of bright sunshine. The sunglasses are great and literally helps against the bright day. As I am also into a lot of outdoor adventures, this product is helping me. Also, I bought it just because of its design actually. :)
customer_reviews.author: Prasad F

customer_reviews.title: Tennis Player's Clear Balls
customer_reviews.text: I play recreational tennis. Any tennis player would know the struggle when one has to serve and the ball's "contact point" lines up perfectly with the sun. One second of blindness follows. My main complain with sport shades is that they are too dark, and the ball disappears from view depending on the angle. I did not have that problem with these! The shades reduced the sun's glare without loss of crispness. I even forgot I had them on while playing, which is all you can ask for when trying to focus on hitting the ball well. I so recommend these shades, that I'll probably buy a couple more!
customer_reviews.author: F. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great price and fit. Not the darkest but still work.
customer_reviews.text: fit well and are not overly large like most. They feel comfortable and come in a very sturdy zip up hard case which I like for protecting them when not in use. Only thing is I wish the lenses were darker. They still do the job and great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Straight out of the case, left ear arm was lower than the right, not an even fit
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have to wear them longer than 10 seconds to know something was wrong. They felt crooked on my face. I took them off to inspect them and learned the left ear arm was hanging lower than the right. I didn't even have a chance to take them outside to set out the vision quality. I'm going to chalk this up to a manufacturer defect and asked for a replacement. I'll update and revisit once I actually have a chance to use them.
customer_reviews.author: V. Davi

customer_reviews.title: Really nice sun glasses.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson who is 13. He thinks my Ray-Bans are "old fashioned". I bought these for him because I thought he would like the styling. He loves them. And they are pretty good polarized sunglasses, especially for the money. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: So far, pretty great!
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are pretty nice! They come with a pretty sturdy feeling case to store them too, and of course a cloth to clean then. They are very light, I was actually concerned they were going to be a bit small on me because of how far they opened, but they actually fit comfortably even wearing them all day outside for work. No complaints yet, I'll update if anything changes as it has only been a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Work very well for Florida boating
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I bought them for boating in Florida. They have excellent glare protection (although not too dark) while on the water and are very comfortable. In addition, they hug my face closely and keep the wind out of my eyes and prevent my contacts from drying out so much. Imagine they'll do the same for biking to work, although I haven't tried that with them, yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a bit more than two months but ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: I used these sunglasses for cycling. They were generally ok, but for two issues: The frame is quite big so it was sometimes difficult to position the glasses so they wouldn't interfere with my bike helmet; and it was difficult to check behind me as the frame would be in my field of vision. I was happy with the lenses and the nose pads. The sunglasses only lasted two months before the frame broke around one of the lenses. Still, at about 1/8th of the cost of some cycling sunglass brands, I can keep buying cheap sunglasses like these when they break and still be ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Lars

customer_reviews.title: Use on the trail
customer_reviews.text: I use the glasses only when I go biking on the trails. So as far as sun protection, I'm not 100% because we go in the evening and the trail is covered with trees for the most part, but they are definitely dark. I do love them because the bugs do not get in my eyes!!
customer_reviews.author: Lionheart

customer_reviews.title: Nose piece design is terrible and they will not hold up to moderate use.
customer_reviews.text: The technology used to secure the nose rests is very poor. Within 6 months of moderate but always careful use the nose piece on one side came off. A few months later the other side also came off. Save your money and buy another brand. Very disappointed with this product...
customer_reviews.author: Elaine P. Baranek

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable for the price
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, for the price, I expected a crap pair of sunglasses... but these are sturdy, come with a hard case shell and cleaning cloth and most importantly, they are polarized. I had to pay $75 for my $230 pair of Oakleys just to have polarized lenses. These are comfy and do a great job protecting your eyes. I won't be buying anymore Oakleys... that much is for sure.
customer_reviews.author: CMan

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: Living in Florida - there's lot of sun. These are great for coverage over full eye. Lightweight, feel nice on face.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great to look through, but not great for all-day wear
customer_reviews.text: They are high quality and are great to look through, but unfortunately they give me headaches when I wear them all day. the bands curve into the head for a more snug fit, which is great if you're just wearing them for cycling or running, but I want glasses I can wear all day at my job, and these start to really hurt the area right above your ears after a few hours, and then give you a major headache. As long as you don't wear them for extended periods I don't think this would be a problem, but if you're looking for sunglasses that can handle 9 hours out in the sun, find another style!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Nice shades, good price
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses arrived promptly. They are nice looking, very light. I don't have any way of assessing the quality of the lenses other than to note that I can see fine with them. Only had them a week or so, but so far so good in terms of durability.
customer_reviews.author: Jim F

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and good looking
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and lightweight sunglasses. I use them while running. The lenses are polarized and reduces a lot of glare. I didn't see any fingerprint on the lenses so they are good. Came in a solid plastic zipper cover. Overall these are good value for money sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: shashank b

customer_reviews.title: BEYOND IMPRESSED! Great for combatting glare!
customer_reviews.text: Beyond impressed and extremely happy with the quality of these sunglasses. Recently had LASIK and my eyes have been very sensitive to the glare/light while driving. Problems solved with these sunglasses. Slightly wraparound help prevent glare and very crisp images make for happy driving. Very comfortable and like them so much I have ordered 2 more styles from them. Case is fantastic too!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. West

customer_reviews.title: Not for people with hair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to run in outside. The polarized lens are actually really great. However, my hair gets snagged every time I take them off of my ears because of the way the different pieces were put together-it isn't one seamless piece for the side pieces. It doesn't matter whether my hair is in a ponytail or it is down, they get snagged. If I had super short hair, it likely wouldn't be an issue. They stay on my head when running which i really appreciate and don't fog up like other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Carlson

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely cheap sunglasses that are too tight on my head. Bought them to cut the grass and other stuff around the house but can’t wear them for too long. Don’t waste you money. Just buy a pair from the gas station because those would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Rob V

customer_reviews.title: Top quality and superb protection from harmful sun rays.
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses. Has its own case as they need a roomy case HUGE difference in these sunglasses compared to my others. When driving: Need to get used to the way these REALLY knock out harmful sun rays . Very attractive on to for snakes and females. Get lots of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Priced well for polarized. The design is fashionable and they are comfortable. The lens causes some minor visual distortion because of the curve and a slight dull glare at certain angles which makes mountain biking a little more challenging. But getting used to them. It's hard to find the perfect cheap sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have a big head and these sunglasses fit well they don't squeeze my head as bad as others I have tried. They block out the sun very well and are polarized great for fishing and at the perfect price. They come with a fantastic storage case, cleaning cloth! I would recommend this product to family, friends and to you!
customer_reviews.author: G. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Sport Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: The low rating is because the nose pieces do not work for keeping the glasses frame away from the face, and being wrap-around, they hold in heat making them fog up very quickly, and therefore, useless.
customer_reviews.author: KROBP

customer_reviews.title: QC problem
customer_reviews.text: The pair I received is asymmetric. The left arm can be 100% opened, but the right arm can only be partially opened (see picture). If this obvious QC problem was overlooked, I doubt about the quality of everything in these glasses
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

product_meta.title: HULISLEM S1 Sport Polarized Sunglasses
feature_bullets: LIGHTWEIGHT POLYCARBONATE FRAME: YOU WILL FORGET YOU ARE WEARING THEM In the middle of an adventure you cannot let heavy sunglasses weigh you down. The Hulislem Sports Polarized Sunglasses have therefore been designed to be extremely lightweight (you won’t believe how much unless you hold a pair in your hands). It is especially great for those who are not used to wearing glasses.The sport sunglasses great for men and women

UV 400 MIRROR FLASH COATING The lenses are mirror flash coated. Which not only limits the amount of light that your eyes are exposed to, but also ensure that no light of wavelength 400 nanometers and below reach your eye. Since light with wavelength below 400 nanometers are the ultra violet light range which can cause damage to the eyes. These means that these glasses give you complete UV protection.UVA, UVB, UVC, Blue Light or any kind of harmful light you can think of

STRESS RESISTANT O MATTER FRAMES An active lifestyle means that your sunglasses will have to be tough and rugged enough to meet up to whatever challenges you throw at it. The specially designed Stress Resistant O Matter Frame can meet up whatever you dish out to it and more.

DUAL LENS POLARIC ELLIPSOID GEOMETRY Each of the lenses are cut from one single toric lens. And incorporate the amazing Dual Lens Polaric Ellipsoid Geometry. This means that you get amazing depth perception, color contrast as well as clarity. Clear lower vision field

S1 LENS COLORING SYSTEM These sunglasses are equipped with the cutting-edge S1 coloring system. Which means that they do not distort the natural colors while adding color contrast. So, your vision is enhanced without being warped. And you can still see natural color in all its glory.
